verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Oh! precious is the flow, newline That makes me white as snow; newline No other fount I know; newline Nothing but the blood of Jesus.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: What can wash away my sin? newline Nothing but the blood of Jesus; newline What can make me whole again? newline Nothing but the blood of Jesus.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: For my pardon, this I see; newline Nothing but the blood of Jesus. newline For my cleansing, this my plea; newline Nothing but the blood of Jesus.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Nothing can for sin atone, newline Nothing but the blood of Jesus; newline Naught of good that I have done, newline Nothing but the blood of Jesus.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: This is all my hope and peace, newline Nothing but the blood of Jesus; newline This is all my righteousness, newline Nothing but the blood of Jesus.
